subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Portsmouth advanced to the quarterfinals of the FA Cup by beating Preston, 1-0, on an injury-time own goal. Middlesbrough was held to a 0-0 tie by Sheffield United in Sunday’s other fifth-round game.Sheffield United largely dominated against Middlesbrough, which missed a chance to score in injury time when Emanuel Pogatetz’s header was blocked. The match will be replayed to determine which club will advance. Manchester United, Chelsea, Bristol Rovers, Barnsley, Cardiff and West Bromwich Albion are the other quarterfinalists.
